content.prompt: Which of the following best explains how the purpose of the speech in the excerpt was interpreted by federal officials?

choices.label: Red Jacket wanted to increase Iroquois commerce with the United States.
Red Jacket sought to protect Iroquois independence from the United States.
Red Jacket desired to abandon traditional Iroquois religious practices for Christianity.
Red Jacket wished to help United States migrants form new settlements on Iroquois land.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
